Text: This has bugger all of anything! 50 seconds of wasted lifetime would be a more appropriate title.

@ Tickles. Just because your views & beliefs differ from other people, does not warrant you to be intolerant and mean towards other religions. Bigot.

since this works about to be about 1.6 errors per verse, this seems a bit ridiculous. (verses are typically a sentence or two)

Even counting all theological statements as errors you would not find that many different things that could be called errors.
Could you work on "100% errors in Evolution next?" I'd love to see that one!

Has anyone actually read this?  It is an Awake periodical published in 1957 by an obviously biased Christian who debunks previous criticisms of the scriptures. Hardly convincing.  I would love it if someone could explain the contradictions in the scriptures. Every attempt I have seen, so far, is an insult to my intelligence.
